description: This is a React functional component named TodoList that renders a list of todo items or an empty state message if no todos exist. It manages rendering logic and passes props to child components.

methods.name: TodoList({ todos, onToggle, onDelete, onUpdate })
methods.description: React functional component that displays either a list of todo items or an empty message.

ctags.name: TodoList
